page.title: 14Glenagoorland games
page.content: Tig is a game that we sometimes play at school.This is how you play it.The person who is on the tig runs after people to try to tip them and the person that was tipped is now "on" and has to catch others. Rounders is a game where there are two teams.One team is in batting the other is fielding. If someone catches the ball all the team of the person who batted it is out and then that team has to field and the other bats. Cricket is a game like rounders there is two teams and there is a batting team and a fielding team and if the ball hits the wickets you're out and the other person after you is in. Hop-scotch is an old game that was played along time ago and we have recently started playing it again.
